Why So Serious ?
Why So Serious is a selfie android app. This helps you to click funny images in the app. Now a days there is a great need of a app which would make people around laugh, annoy, angry for just clicking the pictures.
Why So Serious app lands you on the home page as you enter in the application. There you are provided with different options with a beautiful walpaper at the back. This app provides you 'Why so serious?' and 'Why not serious?' options.
These options lead you to the camera screen to click your beautiful pictures with lots of suprising emosions in it. 'Click Me' button allows you to click the picture.
'Why So Serious?' makes you click pictures when you are in a serious, angry, annoyed mood and makes you smile and click the picture after a funny image displayed on the screen.
'Why Not Serious?' makes you click pictures when you are in a happy, laughing mood and makes you give serious expression and click the picture after a image displayed on the screen.
Thank You..! I hope you enjoy using the application. If any queries or feedback let us know at ssp1996@gmail.com
